Translations.Text: Ma twalav Mass ik, amek id Ifka tili? Lemmer i S ihwi, Irra p d tusbii. D$a Nefka yas itij d ppbut
Sinna, Njebd ip id $uone£, ajbad isehlen
D Neppa i wen Irran iv d aceiiiv, ives d areyyee, u Irra ass d tanekra
D Neppa i wen d Iuznen avu, d abecceo s ueunu S. Nessers ed, seg igenni, aman iufan
iwakken a Neeyu yissen tamurt immuten; a Nessew yissen aias seg wid id Nexleq n lmal, akked imdanen
Ni$ Nfeoq iten garasen, iwakken a d mmektin. Tegwti n yimdanen ugin; atnan kan di tijehli
Lemmer i £ ihwi, yili Nuzen aneddao, i yal tamdint
Ur ppa$ awal i ijehliyen. Nna$ iten yis, amennu$ ameqwoan
D Neppa i Issemfaoaqen sin ilellen, yiwen elaw, d aeidan, wayev oeag, d ameo$an. Irra, garasen, agadir, aedid ur nepwazgar
D Neppa i Ixelqen amdan seg waman. Ifka yas laamum, lexwal. Mass ik Izga d Win Izemren
La aabden, war Oebbi, ayen ur ten inefaan, ur ten ivuooen. Ajehli, ar loiha n Mass is, izga d win issefoa$en
Nuzen ik id kan, i ubecceo d uneddeo
Ini: "ur awen ssutre$, $ef waya, kra n teqdiat. Ssutre$ kan, i win ib$an, ad ia$ abrid $eo Mass is
Ppkel $ef Umuddir ur Nepmeppat. Sbuccaa iT s ccekoan. Iqadd i tussna ibekkaven n imdanen iS
I Ixelqen tamurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen, di sdis wussan. Sinna, Aenin Iaannec af usgeld. Steqsi w iT issnen
Ma pwanecden: "knut i Uenin"! A d rren: "d acu T Uenin? Day a neknu i w ara $ d tamoev"? D a$unfu i sen irna
